name: Corgea
long_description: Corgea is an autonomous application security platform that finds and validates vulnerabilities, then generates safe code fixes developers can apply in their existing workflow. In production customers like Zapier and Yageo, see ~20% more true positives and ~90% fewer false positives (vs their prior tooling), reducing triage and speeding remediation without adding headcount.
one_liner: Corgea finds, and fixes insecure code and packages autonomously.
